entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. A few showers beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
